about.title: Our History of Trust and Quality
about.description: For over 10 years, JR Transfer has been dedicated to offering a transport service that goes beyond the journey. Our priority is your safety, comfort, and satisfaction. With a modern fleet and professional drivers, we guarantee a smooth and unforgettable travel experience, whether for business or leisure.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We serve the entire city of Rio de Janeiro, including airports (Galeão and Santos Dumont), hotels in the South Zone, Barra da Tijuca, and we also offer trips to nearby destinations such as Angra dos Reis, Búzios, and Arraial do Cabo.

items.question: How do I book a service?
items.answer: Booking is simple and fast. You can contact us directly via WhatsApp by clicking any of the buttons on the site, or by filling out the contact form. Our team will promptly respond with your quote.

items.question: Do you provide child seats?
items.answer: Yes! The safety of the little ones is our priority. We offer child seats and booster seats at no additional cost. Just remember to request one at the time of booking to ensure availability.

items.question: What are the payment methods?
items.answer: To secure your reservation, a 20% down payment via PIX or bank transfer to JR Transfer & City Tour is required. The remaining balance can be paid in cash, PIX, or by credit card. Credit card payments are subject to a 6% surcharge!
